name: Will of Fire:Bond
description:
Join millions of players in the journey of ninja cultivation, build the strongest ninja team and make contribution to the peace of the ninja world! Let's go!

=Popular Ninjas=
Recruit your favorite ninjas and develop unique battle styles by using different attributes and formations! Have your ninjas work together and gain your own victory!

=Rankings=
Build a powerful Group and win a place in the World Rankings! Grow stronger with other Group members and go for the peak!

=Multiple Modes=
Besides for Dungeons and Arena, you can also enjoy other modes like Rock Paper Scissors, Treasure Maze and Autoplay. Have fun!
